mapper.sql: logid, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, order_id, pay_channel, trade_number, trade_time, trade_sum, currency, login_id, login_name, pay_state, cur_state, state_time, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_pay_manage_info WHERE 1=1 AND trade_day = #{trade_day} AND cur_state = #{cur_state} ORDER BY trade_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_pay_manage_info( logid, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, order_id, pay_channel, trade_number, trade_time, trade_sum, currency, login_id, login_name, pay_state, cur_state, state_time, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{trade_day}, #{corp_id}, #{corp_name}, #{order_id}, #{pay_channel}, #{trade_number}, #{trade_time}, #{trade_sum}, #{currency}, #{login_id}, #{login_name}, #{pay_state}, #{cur_state}, #{state_time}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_pay_manage_info SET cur_state = #{cur_state}, state_time = #{state_time} WHERE trade_number = #{trade_number}
